name: 50 50 with FRIENDS
description:
Download the BRAND NEW 50 50 with friends now!

Now you can play the hit game 50 50-the addictive slicing game with your friends and other people around the world.

Challenge others being super precise slicing everything and anything exactly 50% 50%.

Level up and unlock new level packs to test your opponents and work your way through the achievements.

Use the inbuilt messenger to taunt your opponents.

Can you become the slicing Sensai!
